Héctor Fabio Cruz, former doctor for the Colombia NT: "James is distracted, instead of working to prepare himself for the new season, he's more concerned with fixing his eyebrows & his hair when he should be making sure he's physically in the best shape possible” [as]

PSG in ongoing negotiations with Real Madrid for Keylor Navas

RMC confirm this evening that Ligue 1 side PSG are in negotiations with Real Madrid for the transfer of Costa Rican international goalkeeper Keylor Navas.

Contrary to claims elsewhere, the two clubs have yet to reach a fee agreement. A source close to discussions denied the likelihood of a medical tomorrow, but confirmed that the deal had a good chance of coming off.

Les Parisiens had been looking at Gianluigi Donnarumma (AC Milan) as another target for goalkeeper position, but he is believed to be too expensive.
